project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a basic text-based game in Python where players can navigate through rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Set up the game framework and room navigation system
Develop inventory system to view collected items
Create simple challenges that the player can encounter
Write tests for the framework, room navigation, item pickup, inventory viewing, and challenges
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure proper functionality
